name: Hyunjin Park
content: Hyunjin Park(박현진) skip to main | skip to sidebar Hyunjin Park(박현진) 2010년 2월 26일 금요일 Hyunjin Park (박현진) Hyunjin Park Ph.D. Professor School of Electronic and Electrical Engineering (primary)Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering Department of Artificial IntelligenceDepartment of Biomedical Engineering Center for Neuroscience Imaging Research Sungkyunkwan University, Suwon, Korea hyunjinp@skku.edu, hyunjinp@gmail.com +82-31-299-4956 Medical Image Processing Lab (MIPL) 의료영상처리연구실 성균관대학교 전자전기공학부/전자전기컴퓨터공학과 의료영상처리연구실은 대학원생과 박사후연구원을 모집합니다. 대학원생에게는 학비지원을 포함한 많은 장학금 혜택이 있습니다. 박사후연구원은 급여를 포함하여 국내최고 대우가 가능합니다. 관심있으신 분들은 이메일로 지원하시기 바랍니다. Education and Training B.S. Electrical Engineering, Seoul National University, Seoul, South Korea, 1997 Military Service, Kwangju, South Korea, 1997-1998 M.S. Biomedical Engineering, University of Michigan, Ann Arbor, MI, 2000 M.S. Electrical Engineering, University of Michigan, Ann Arbor, MI, 2000 Ph.D. Biomedical Engineering, University of Michigan, Ann Arbor, MI, 2003 Postdoc Department of Radiology, University of Michigan, Ann Arbor, MI, 2003-2004 Academic Appointments Research Investigator: Department of Radiology, University of Michigan, Ann Arbor, MI, 2004-2007 Assistant Prof (Research): Department of Radiology, University of Michigan, Ann Arbor, MI, 2007-2009 Assistant Prof: Dept of Biomedical Engineering, Gachon University, Korea, 2009 - 2012 Assistant Prof: School of Electronic and Electrical Engineering, Sungkyunkwan University, 2012 - 2013 Associate Prof: School of Electronic and Electrical Engineering, Sungkyunkwan University, 2013 - 2019 Professor: School of Electronic and Electrical Engineering, Sungkyunkwan University, 2019 - current Research Interest Image processing for medical imagery including image registration and segmentation. Computer vision for medical imagery.Medical image analysis for cancer management. Neuroimaging analysis, radiomics, and imaging genetics. Editorial board and peer review 2013-Current Editorial board for Biomedical Engineering Letters 2018-Current Editorial board for Medicine 2019-Current Editorial board for Scientific Reports 2020-Current Editorial board for Frontiers in Neuroscience 2020-Current Editorial borad for Electronics2021-Current Editorial board for Life 2002-Current Reviewer for IEEE Transactions on Medical Imaging 2006-Current Reviewer for Medical Image Computing and Computer Aided Intervention (MICCAI) 2006-Current Reviewer for IEEE Transactions on Image Processing 2009-Current Reviewer for Medical Physics Journal Papers (n=200), Google Scholar Profile, ORCID JCR indexed (n = 169), main author papers in JCR (n = 124), LNCS (n = 18), scopus (n = 3), * equal contribution, # as corresponding author [Preprint]To be filled[2025]J.
